Creamy Stovetop Polenta

40 min | Makes about 4 cups, enough for 2-4 people as a side with dinner
Top with sauteed mushrooms and a soft-boiled egg for the perfect warm and cozy winter meal. Or, add fresh herbs and corn just cut off the cob...

basics   corn   dinner   italian   parmesan   polenta   side-dish   weeknight
Made with love and many mistakes by Sharon Brener.
